title: Bug 124599 - Shortcut delete and menu delete act different in table column.
description:
Description: Shortcut delete and menu delete act different in table column.
Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: In step 2, the whole grid in the group header was deleted. In step 3, the grid in the group header remained untouched.
EB:
Undo it, click delete in the context menu.
Expected result: Both shortcut delete and menu delete should act the same.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Perform the shortcut delete action or click delete in the menu.
2. Observe the behavior in the grid in the group header.
